title.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIU) Advanced Wireroom Analyst Course

description.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIU) Advanced Wireroom Analyst Course; This week long course is designed for SIU analyst and investigators who are working on complex, international, wiretap investigations. Investigators learn how to utilize different software tools in order to conduct toll analysis and construct organizational charts. Participants learn to focus their investigative efforts on productive phone lines and how to properly document and interpret intercepted telephone conversations. Finally, participants learn the legal concept of conspiracy and how to apply it to their investigations.

sector.narrative: Stabilization Operations and Security Sector Reform

transaction.usg:treasury-account: Drug Enforcement Administration, Salaries and Expenses

sector.narrative: Stabilization Operations and Security Sector Reform

transaction.usg:treasury-account: Drug Enforcement Administration, Salaries and Expenses

title.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIU) Tactical & Emergency Response Training

description.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIU) Tactical & Emergency Response Training; This one-week course is intended for participants assigned to active drug enforcement units with operational duties. The training areas include: drug raid planning and entry techniques, risk assessment, handcuffing techniques, defensive tactics, and vehicle containment and related arrests. All classroom topics are enhanced with practical exercises and include the use of simunition weapons and the Firearms Training Simulator.

sector.narrative: Stabilization Operations and Security Sector Reform

transaction.usg:treasury-account: Drug Enforcement Administration, Salaries and Expenses

sector.narrative: Stabilization Operations and Security Sector Reform

transaction.usg:treasury-account: Drug Enforcement Administration, Salaries and Expenses

title.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIU) Tactical Operations Seminar

description.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIU) Tactical Operations Seminar; While other SIU courses encourage mixing participants from other countries, this one week long course is designed for individual SIU units to practice tactical entries with their colleagues. This course concentrates on operational planning, raids, defensive tactics and emergency medical first response.

sector.narrative: Stabilization Operations and Security Sector Reform

title.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIUB) Advanced Course, Columbia

description.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIUB) Advanced Course, Columbia; This course supplements instruction provided during the SIU Basic Course and provides additional instruction on several aspects of conducting a judicial wire intercept investigation. These include undercover operations, advanced operational planning, tactical entries, confidential Source management, and money laundering

title.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIUD) Basic Course, Columbia

description.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIUD) Basic Course, Columbia; This is a five week course serves as the foundation in fundamental law enforcement practices for newly assigned officers. It is based on the DEA Basic Agent training program and covers a wide range of topics in drug law enforcement.

title.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIU 6) Advanced Course, Colombia

description.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIU 6) Advanced Course, Colombia; This one-week advanced training course is designed for SIU commanders responsible for supervising units. The course addresses all core topics from a SIU managers perspective which includes the following; management of SIU, DEA oversight of program, operational planning, critical incident response, risk management, officer safety, leadership, ethics and professionalism in law enforcement, confidential source management, the supervision of enforcement operations, as well as the identification of trends associated with narco-terrorism. The course is conducted via a workshop environment and also encourages SIU commanders and DEA management to exchange information in order to make important decisions needed to improve the SIU program

description.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIUD) Basic Course, Columbia; Special Investigative Unit (SIUG) Basic Course, SIUB112; This is a five week course serves as the foundation in fundamental law enforcement practices for newly assigned officers. It is based on the DEA Basic Agent training program and covers a wide range of topics in drug law enforcement.

activity-date.narrative: Date unavailable. Calculated start date is the earliest transaction date
